Generated Narrative: ValueSet v3-ObservationDetectedIssueCode

Language: en

This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include codes fromhttp://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ActCode where concept is-a OBSA
  • Import all the codes that are contained in ConditionDetectedIssueCode
  • Import all the codes that are contained in AgeDetectedIssueCode
  • Import all the codes that are contained in ReactionDetectedIssueCode
  • Import all the codes that are contained in RelatedReactionDetectedIssueCode

name: ObservationDetectedIssueCode
title: ObservationDetectedIssueCode
description: Proposed therapy may be inappropriate or contraindicated due to conditions or characteristics of the patient
